scLinaX 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    scLinaX_vignette

    Function reference

    All functions

    AIDA_QCREF
    Test data for QC of reference genes.
    Gene_QC()
    QC to remove potential escapee genes from reference gene set
    XCI_ref
    A dataframe (tibble) containing X chromosome inactivation (XCI) status.
    make_QC_gene_table()
    Create a dataframe for QC of candidate reference genes
    make_QCed_df()
    Quality Control of the input data frame (for internal use only)
    make_per_SNP_sample_df()
    Generate a per-SNP summary of the number of samples (for internal use only)
    make_pseudobulk_refSNP()
    Create pseudobulk data for reference SNPs (for internal use only)
    multiome_ASE_df
    Test single-cell allele-specific expression data for scLinaX.
    multiome_ATAC_ASE_data
    Test single-cell allele-specific chromatin accessibility data for scLinaX-multi.
    multiome_Annotation
    Test data for QC of reference genes.
    multiome_peak_data
    Test peak data for scLinaX-multi.
    run_RefGeneQC()
    Run Gene Quality Control (QC) function
    run_clustering()
    Generate pseudobulk profiles for individuals and calculate correlations (for internal use only)
    run_grouping()
    Define groups for SNP alleles (for internal use only)
    run_scLinaX()
    Run scLinaX analysis for all samples
    run_scLinaX_multi()
    Run scLinaX-multi using the scATAC data and output from scLinaX (Currently, only single sample mode is implemented).
    summarize_QC_gene_table()
    Summarize the dataframe generated for QC
    summarize_scLinaX()
    Summarize scLinaX results (return per-individual summary)
    summarize_scLinaX_multi()
    Summarize scLinaX-multi results

    Developed by Yoshihiko Tomofuji.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
